divs: Sighting DetailsThe light object appeared again this is the 7th day in a row, I decided to write tonight here on mufon because of what follows. Every other night the light object has appear it has been at sunset eventually blending into the background trying to look like a star. It starts in the north and heads south southwest every night at first it looked as if it was scanning the area tonight i can tell you that it is. As the light object moves south west he begins to disappear and I think this is it the end of its run, but something else happen. as it vanishes a new light appears larger and more blurred out and covering two quarters of the skyline, a giant white glow now sits where one has never been before. The light object reappears and this time it has a weird motion it turns to the north and the light gets bright, but as it turns to the south the light diminishes, I now know for a fact as this light object continues its path to the new light source that it is scanning for something. I will continue tracking it and will continue reporting .
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Warwick
There were no other sightings in Warwick on or around October 30th 2013
